name: Scurry (code_box)
description:
Keep your rabbits save by whistling.
How large can you grow your herd?

Originally this was intended as a solo 3h game but ballooned into a weekend project.
Dev Time 12.5h: Core Mechanics 3h, Visuals 4h, Audio 1h, Ballancing 2h, Background Music 1.5h, Various 1h
Other 2h: Game Design 1h, Publishing 1h

All graphics are from Kenney's "Jumper Pack" and game-icons.net.
Audio FX are from freesound.org creator "InspectorJ".
